name: nordsoftware/lumen-file-manager
description: File manager module for the Lumen framework.

suggest.league/fractal: Install to serialize files using FileTransformer
suggest.league/flysystem-aws-s3-v3: Install to use Amazon S3 as the storage adapter
suggest.nordsoftware/lumen-cloudinary: Install to use Cloudinary as the storage adapter
suggest.doctrine/orm: Install to use Doctrine ORM as the storage adapter
suggest.doctrine/mongodb-odm: Install to use Doctrine MongoDb ODM as the storage adapter
